ui
Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ui.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GameBoard
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer

The GameBoard serves as the UI for the Quoridor game. It updates from the back end via a Subject/Observer design pattern. The Game object is the subject and the GameBoard object is the observer.

Author:
Dylan Woythol, Tyler Smith, Eli Donahue
See Also:
Serialized Form
